name: Coots Wants Attention
description:
This game is an entry to the Ludwig 2023 Game Jam, and this submission was made over five days.

GitHub Repository: https://github.com/Linus-Vallinder/ludwig-jam-2023

Description

As you already know, you are the invincible, all-powerful, all-knowing master of the universe Coots, the cat. However, the puny human who fancies himself as your owner has seemingly been more distant, and his acts of gratitude for your mere presence have been waning. 

To set the world in order again, we must bring this human's shameful actions to his attention and set things right. However, your miserable vessel cannot do such activities by force. You have to use your intellect to gain the attention of your "owner" and bring him to justice.
